before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"eb1lg","text":"Starting specimens:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ad6q7","text":"Starting samples = FFPE tissues cut to 4 micron thickness and adhered to positively-charged microscopy slides (e.g. SuperFrost Plus Slides; Fisher Scientific 12-550-15). It is crucial that tissues are adequately fixed to prevent tissue degradation but not over-fixed as to over-fragment RNA. Tissues no thicker than 0.5 centimeters should be freshly harvested and placed into 10% neutral-buffered formalin (NBF) at a ratio of at least 20 volumes fixative per one volume tissue. Tissues should be fixed for between 16-30 hours at room temperature (RT), followed by immediate transfer to 70% ethanol and processing into FFPE tissue blocks. Fixation times should be optimized for individual tissues and experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"45nds","text":"An immunohistochemistry (IHC) staining protocol for in situ identification of IgA in pig tissue. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":52,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4eqlm","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"fts5o","text":"Assay Controls:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e739o","text":"Here are a few controls you can use to ensure assay is working correctly:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhkh7","text":"IHC controls:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9oe0","text":"o  Negative control (primary antibody only)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"llm5","text":"§ This slide receives 0.05% PBS-T in place of secondary antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3lp0","text":"o  Negative control (secondary antibody only)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"33fjh","text":"§ This slide receives 1% BSA in PBS in place of diluted primary antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6k5d","text":"o  Batch control ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78oc9","text":"§ If performing staining across multiple batches, include serial sections of one tissue in each batch that has positive staining for Salmonella\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ainp6","text":"Assay variations:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fr0oa","text":"Parameters for some steps (e.g. antibody incubations, antigen retrieval, chromogen incubations, counterstaining) may need to be further optimized for different tissues or targets. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"djei1","text":"Before starting the assay: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7i7i","text":"Preheat a dry oven to 60℃ ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ns8b","text":"Load slides for assay into vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fe4c5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8053","text":"Baking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4g1f","text":"Bake slides 20 min 60℃","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7m852","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bi6c","text":"While slides bake:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6a5bd","text":"Prepare 0.05% PBS-T (can store at RT up to 1 month)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c07eq","text":"Immediately before deparaffinizing:
-Add ~200 mL xylenes to each of three clearing agent dishes in a fume hood
-Add ~200 mL 100% ethanol to each of two staining dishes in a fume hood
-Add ~200 mL 95% ethanol to a staining dish in a fume hood
-Add ~200 mL 85% ethanol to a staining dish in a fume hood
-Add ~200 mL 70% ethanol to a staining dish in a fume hood
-Add ~200 mL distilled water to a staining dish in a fume hood
-Add ~200 mL PBS-T to a staining dish in a fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1r9a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"enod9","text":"Deparaffinizing & Rehydrating","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fs71b","text":"Submerge slide in fresh xylenes 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dr3ai","text":"Submerge slide in fresh xylenes 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e84rh","text":"Submerge slide in fresh xylenes 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6k2as","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 100% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6ehk","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 100% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmlr5","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 95% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddc2p","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 85% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"lhsu","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 70% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmpdo","text":"Submerge slides in fresh distilled water 3 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qn4","text":"Submerge slides in fresh PBS-T for transport","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2deiv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17l2o","text":"While slides deparaffinize/rehydrate:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vga3","text":"Turn off dry oven","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2cutm","text":"Prepare humidified slide staining tray by adding water to bottom & placing lid on top","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5c6pa","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to each of two staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4f55","text":"Hydrophobic Barrier","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3mtob","text":"Apply hydrophobic barrier around each tissue","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7llj","text":"o  ----------One by one, unload slides from vertical rack submerged in PBS-T. Dry off only the area around the tissue where a barrier will be drawn with a hydrophobic barrier pen. Keep tissue area wet the whole time. Draw barrier and place slide flat in the slide staining tray. Using a pipette, apply a small amount of PBS-T within the barrier (just enough to keep the tissue wet while drawing barriers on remaining slides)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vm6f","text":"Leave slides in slide staining tray","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9hu7n","text":"Protease Digestion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"binfe","text":"Decant slides and again place flat in slide staining tray","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f285b","text":"Incubate with Proteinase K 3 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7kuat","text":"o  ----------Invert bottle immediately before use; apply drops to completely cover tissues; let incubate in slide staining tray with lid closed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jdca","text":"Decant slides and transfer to vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5e2fs","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chh1s","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ud31","text":"Protein Blocking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qo50","text":"Decant slides and again place flat in slide staining tray","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ovep","text":"Incubate with Protein Block 20 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dktii","text":"o  ----------Invert bottle immediately before use; apply drops to completely cover tissues; let incubate in slide staining tray with lid closed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fg8ht","text":"Decant slides and transfer to vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aipbb","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hhia","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7svur","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jooq","text":"While slides incubate with protein block:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a5cgb","text":"Discard tissue quenching reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5r5c","text":"Prepare primary antibody by adding IgA antibody to 1% BSA in PBS at a dilution of ~0.033 ug/mL (1:40,000 dilution if stock concentration is 1 mg/mL). Total volume to use is dependent on tissue sizes. Make sure to mix reagents before pipetting.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"de87t","text":"Primary Antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"di19p","text":"Decant slides and again place flat in slide staining tray","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnrf1","text":"Incubate with diluted primary antibody overnight at 4℃","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":40}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6agm","text":"o  ----------Apply drops to completely cover tissues; let incubate in slide staining tray with lid closed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kk3n","text":"Remove slides from slide staining tray, decant, and transfer to vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qsa4","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a41dq","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1n0va","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t6nn","text":"While slides are incubating with primary antibody:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ai4s6","text":"Discard protein blocking reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

apply drops to completely cover tissues; let incubate in slide staining tray with lid closed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bkbk4","text":"Decant slides and transfer to vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3m9u1","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6pith","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3o9ud","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dm032","text":"While slides are incubating with secondary antibody:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6l795","text":"Discard remaining primary antibody reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qis8","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to each of two staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"291gp","text":"Immediately before chromogen detection:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aoc2t","text":"Prepare diluted DAB chromogen by adding 1 drop DAB substrate per 1 mL substrate buffer. Total volume to use is dependent on tissue sizes. Make sure to mix reagents thoroughly. Store in the dark due to light sensitivity","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4mp57","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61o4o","text":"Chromogen Detection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ndq8","text":"Decant slides and again place flat in slide staining tray","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2sgin","text":"Incubate with diluted DAB chromogen 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86sl0","text":"o  ----------Pipette well to mix immediately before use; pipette appropriate volumes to completely cover tissues \u0026 let incubate in slide staining tray with lid closed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ntvs","text":"Decant slides and transfer to vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4cj4p","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"db6pq","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78j7e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fd7j5","text":"While slides are incubating with DAB chromogen:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"njq0","text":"Discard secondary antibody reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bgb5d","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to each of two staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"birdj","text":"Add ~200 mL 25% hematoxylin to one staining dish","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ap5p5","text":"o  ----------Prepare by combining 150 mL distilled water with 50 mL Gill’s Hematoxylin","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7t8t8","text":"Add ~200 mL distilled water to each of three staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1o9ih","text":"Add ~200 mL 95% ethanol to a staining dish in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtham","text":"Add ~200 mL 100% ethanol to each of three staining dishes in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4otpu","text":"Add ~200 mL Pro-Par to each of three clearing agent dishes in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bacv8","text":"Counterstaining","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2i8qc","text":"Submerge slide rack in diluted hematoxylin 15 sec RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ari6","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh distilled water, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86spb","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh distilled water, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5amdl","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh distilled water, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3fk9i","text":"Mounting","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4frrf","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 95% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6arr7","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 100% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"33jrb","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 100% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1s6nq","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 100% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7gfl5","text":"Submerge slides in fresh Pro-Par 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"96k63","text":"Submerge slides in fresh Pro-Par 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dj56u","text":"Submerge slides in fresh Pro-Par 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61obi","text":"Mount slides by adding 2-4 drops of mounting media to each slide, followed by application of a cover glass. Remove bubbles from tissue by applying pressure to cover glass","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bqavc","text":"Place slides flat in a dry, dark space to air dry at RT overnight","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ist8","text":"Assess staining with a bright-field microscope","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8vvoe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eurpv","text":"While slides are air drying:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50i4e","text":"Discard chromogen detection and counterstaining reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
